page.title: 15Public Services Of Highworth
page.content: {The Fire Station At Stratton. In Highworth they deal with 180 calls a year.They work from Sunday to Monday,in the daytime.If there was a fire at night they would be called out on their bleepers.They have 12 fulltime workers and 12 parttime.They have one fire fighting and rescue vehicle,and one fire fighting vehicle.They cover the eastern side of Swindon to the county border. {The Police Station In Highworth. The crime of the day varies from a lost dog to a murder.At the police station they have 3 vehicles, all cars.They do not have any weapons.Sometimes they have to bring backups from Swindon.{ { { { {
